channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’ve yelled, screamed and cried’: My mother gave $400K to online scammers. She still gives them Apple gift cards. What can I do?
item.description: “I have been living a nightmare with my mother for seven years.”

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Oil touches lowest prices since September on tariff worries, OPEC+ output plans
item.description: Oil headed lower for a fourth straight session Wednesday, with crude prices hitting their lowest levels since September, on prospects for a global tra...

item.title: Abercrombie & Fitch’s stock falls to 15-month low as retailer weighs tariff impact
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch also approved a $1.3 billion share-repurchase program, including $400 million in 2025.

item.title: I signed a prenup, but my husband refuses to make a will or set up a trust. If he dies, will I inherit his estate?
item.description: “He has one adult son from whom he is estranged. He is 71 and I am 69.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: U.S. economy is still growing, ISM says, but Trump tariffs are causing ‘great uncertainty’ and more inflation
item.description: The large service side of the U.S. economy that employs most Americans grew in February, but businesses said they were nervous about the Trump tariffs...
